question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You are going on a month training programme to the UK and know that the head of the course would like one of the participants to be the social events' organiser.Write a letter to the Training Organiser. In your letter• expressing your interest in the role• requesting more information about it• explaining what experience you haveBegin your letter as follows:Dear ...,You should write at least 150 words.
text: I will be participating in your one-month training programme in the UK. According to my supervisor, there is an available position for a social events organizer and would like to express my interest in applying for the role.

I graduated from Sheffield Hallam University and obtain a degree in Leisure and Events management. During my college studies, I had organizes different sporting and recreational events for the school as it was one of the requirements to pass the course. Furthermore, I have been working as an activity and recreation coordinator in a private clubhouse in Hong Kong. My main duties are to organise and host different leisure and sports events for our club members.

As for the position, I would like to request  more information such as the job duties and if there will be monetary rewards. ,Moreover will the job require any special qualification on my side and the possibility of a full-time position after the training.
Thank you for your kind consideration, I do hope to hear from you soon. If you have any questions please feel free to contact me.
